page.title: 19HOME-LIFE - FOOD.
page.content: Here is a list of common food prices: 1 kilo bag of sugar 50p Potatoes (per lb) 11p Butter (per lb) 90p Loaf of bread 37p Tin of soup (medium) 25p Tea Bags (80) Â£1.10 Oranges (each) 12p Eggs (1 dozen) Â£1.00 Apples (lb) 45p Tin of beans 25p 1 pint of milk 21p Cheddar cheese (lb) Â£1.00 Fish (per lb) 90p Meat steak mince (lb) Â£1.45 Rump steak (lb) Â£2.30 Cereal cornflakes (500gms) 75p Jar of coffee (200gms) Â£2.20 Mars Bar (confectionery) 18p Packet of crisps 14p Gallon of petrol Â£2.00
